testCase: Test Case 6: Successfully Register a New Movie

modules.purpose: Home Page - Initial landing page for the application.

execution_steps.step: Verify that home page is visible successfully

modules.purpose: Create Movie Page - Page to input movie details for registration.

execution_steps.step: Fill in all required fields: url cartaz, nome, descrição, faixa etária, diretor(a), escritor(a), ator(a), gênero, and data de lançamento
Verify success message 'Film Created Successfully!' is visible
